review_text: Applied for the Deposit operations opening with this bank, The bank claims to care about communication but some red flags defiantly came up. Was ghosted after the interview (having been given the deposit operations managers card with her email. just to be ignored and never get an email reply. at this point i had already written this bank off as a place i wouldn't like to join. they called 2 weeks later saying the job had been filled. managers and supervisor over deposit operations need to work on their communication. my advice? avoid this bank.

The tellers are fabulous to work with.  However, when I went in there as a long time customer, to be insulted by the upper management by them questioning provided documentation to deposit a long awaited check,  they have lost my business.  We used Dime Bank because of their commitment to local business, but learned today that they are only committed to themselves.   We will now seek out a local bank willing to be a partner with us to grow our business.  Not a bank who isn't interested in maintaining a 20yr banking relationship.
